mapper.select: SELECT Q.UUID, Q.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME AS userNickname, Q.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_ID, Q.QNA_TITLE, TO_CHAR(Q.QNA_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_CREATED_AT, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.COUNT, Q.QNA_URL, Q.CONTENT_TYPE, Q.QNA_IMAGE, Q.ANSWER_USERID, Q.ANSWER_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_CREATED_AT, Q.ANSWER_IMAGE, U2.NICKNAME AS answerNickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS C WHERE C.UUID = Q.UUID AND C.TARGET_TYPE = 'qna') AS commentCount FROM QNA Q JOIN USERS U ON Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN USERS U2 ON Q.ANSWER_USERID = U2.USER_ID ORDER BY Q.QNA_CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{firstIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageUnit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT Q.UUID, Q.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME AS userNickname, Q.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_ID, Q.QNA_TITLE, TO_CHAR(Q.QNA_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_CREATED_AT, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.COUNT, Q.QNA_URL, Q.CONTENT_TYPE, Q.QNA_IMAGE, Q.ANSWER_USERID, Q.ANSWER_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(Q.ANSWER_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_CREATED_AT, Q.ANSWER_IMAGE, U2.NICKNAME AS answerNickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS C WHERE C.UUID = Q.UUID AND C.TARGET_TYPE = 'qna') AS commentCount FROM QNA Q JOIN USERS U ON Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN USERS U2 ON Q.ANSWER_USERID = U2.USER_ID WHERE Q.UUID = #{uuid}
